alert.note: Alert for Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:25AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tuscaloosa County through 300 AM CDT... At 225 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Deerlick Creek Campgrounds, or over Holt, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tuscaloosa, Holt, Lake View, Brookwood, Coaling, Vance, Abernant, Lake Wildwood, University Mall, Deerlick Creek Campgrounds, Mercedes Benz Of Alabama, North Bibb, Cottondale, East Brookwood, Peterson, Lake Harris, Lake Nicol, Caffee Junction, Lake Tuscaloosa Dam and Fleetwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
